title: Computational models of information scent-following in a very large browsable text collection
proctitle: CHI '97: Proceedings of the ACM SIGCHI Conference on Human factors in computing systems

authors.name: Peter Pirolli
authors.institution: Xerox PARC, 3333 Coyote Hill Road, Palo Alto, CA

references.text: Anderson, J.R. (1993). Rules of the mind HiUsdale, NJ: Lawrence Erlbaum Associates.
